main event: Two officers sighted a large, fast, dark object with a dull gray or silver finish over Sacramento, California on 31 August 1949.
interesting points: The object had very short rounded wings and a short rounded nose,Observers agreed on the object's speed being approximately 700-800 miles per hour,The sighting lasted 3-10 seconds and there was no noise from the object,It was compared in size to a C-54 aircraft,The object faded from view against the light of the moon.
sighted object: large dark object with rounded wings
witness description: officers from Mather Air Force Base, one was an amateur astronomer
